title: Porvoo's Ecoshop
description: A ecolgical goods store on the main street of Porvoo, in the basement floor with own entrance. Sells foods, sweet and salty snacks, soft drinks, superfoods, canvas bags, grains, beans, vegetable oil, bread, cosmetics, washing agents, fresh fruit and vegetable, and other everyday goods. You can collect dried fruits, nuts and grains in a paper bag and pay by weight.
